name: Tinghuan Chen
content: Tinghuan Chen â° Ã Tinghuan Chen About Publications Research Team Resource Teaching Services Calendar Tinghuan Chen Assistant Professor School of Science and Engineering The Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen B.Eng. (SEU), M.Eng. (SEU), Ph.D. (CUHK) Curriculum Vitae About I'm an Assistant Professor in the School of Science and Engineering, the Chinese University of Hong Kong, Shenzhen. I have been selected as a Young Principal Scientist in the National Key R&D Program of China and a National High-level Young Scholar of China. I earned my Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from the Chinese University of Hong Kong, advised by Prof. Bei Yu. My research interests include VLSI CAD and deep learning accelerators. I have openings for highly motivated Ph.D. students, Postdoc and Research Assistants with background in Electronic and Computer Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering or other related fields. Please contact me with your CV and transcript if youâre interested. Contact E-mail: chentinghuan@cuhk.edu.cn Office: TC413B Office Hours:	Thursday 16:00-18:00 Phone: (86)-0755-23519712
